item.title: Async Seminar Continues
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: We continue our discussion. We transform that conventional model for a seminar from live face to face to a distributed, asynchronous model through collaborative reading & generous thinking Goals for this week Engage meaningfully with the discussion as prepared for you by your peers Read Dr. Graham will update this page to direct you to the appropriate materials for this week once we have settled our schedule. Do Discussion Leaders: Discussion leaders will remain alert and will respond to posts and queries on their respective articles.
